about.subtitle: INTRODUCTION
about.title: About Me
about.description: Throughout my career, I've worked at companies to create effective software solutions. My experience with TypeScript, JavaScript, React, and Vue.js has been a key part of my success. This portfolio provides a comprehensive view of my professional work and personal projects, demonstrating my ability to find new job opportunities.

responsibilities.01: Creation of reusable components: I developed reusable Vue.js components to speed up development and maintain consistency in the interface.
responsibilities.02: Improvement of the shopping experience and mobile responsiveness: I identified and resolved errors in the purchasing process, ensuring a smooth experience for users. Additionally, I worked on optimizing the user interface for mobile devices, ensuring that the web application is functional and appealing on screens of different sizes.

responsibilities.01: Maintenance and content updates: I performed maintenance and updates on existing websites, ensuring that the content was up to date and aligned with the business goals.
responsibilities.02: Translation to English for the web: I was responsible for implementing English translation of the user interface for the web application, expanding its reach to an international audience and improving usability for English-speaking users.
responsibilities.03: Implementation of features in the product manager: I collaborated on implementing enhancements and features in the product manager, improving efficiency and the user experience.
responsibilities.04: Maintenance and update of API endpoints: I participated in the regular maintenance of API endpoints, ensuring that the Vue.js application could access up-to-date data and function smoothly.

projects.subtitle: MY WORK
projects.title: Projects
projects.description: In my portfolio, you will find a selection of projects that showcase my ability to turn concepts into tangible solutions. Each project is presented with links to code repositories and live demonstrations, offering a detailed view of my work in action.

01.title: Safe Capital
01.description: This project is a web portal that provides detailed information about investment funds. Users can explore historical performance data, compare funds, and use filtering tools.

02.title: Music Festival
02.description: This project is a website that presents schedules and details of a music festival, allowing attendees to easily access essential information for their event experience.

03.title: Personal Website
03.description: This project is a web development blog that offers a variety of articles for web development enthusiasts. Visitors can explore content on trends to improve their web programming skills.
